name: EvoTyrant Version 0.7
description:
STORYLINE: You are Nam a human from the Planet Earth. The time period is set in the 1800s a time when technology was non existent. That is until a race known as the EvoTyrants come to Earth in search of a special technology that was lost during a civil war the took place on a distant planet. Nam is in possession of this item a special suit made of this most expensive space technology.

GAMEPLAY: A First Person Shooter game where the choices you make will decide your future. You can collect currency to buy items. You will uncover the secrets behind the EvoTyrant war. Develop relationships or create enemies. You will even be able to date in this game. The only question is... How will you handle the EvoTyrant King? 

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY!!!

New dialogue and mission system with over 25 different characters. Some are not shown in advertisements. 

Decision making and First Person Shooter Action ( Playable but still in beta.)

And some free NSFW unlocks. Good Luck.
